node.excerpt: Happy New Year! As promised I made a rudimentary Linux shell script utilizing the tar and gzip commands to archive or make backups. If you’re new to shell scripting you might like to read this articles. http://www.dartmouth.edu/~rc/classes/ksh/print_pages.shtml http://tldp.org/LDP/abs/html/ If you’re lazy like I am. Don’t worry I’ll explain parts of the code.

frontmatter.title: How to Write a Backup Shell Script using Tar and Gnu Zip
